name: Shifting Theatre
description:
In the Shifting Theatre you play as an actor in a play about a hero searching for a treasure in a millenary dungeon.

It's a quite challenging platformer with every element you used to hate in the good old Mario games :)

The game is fairly short, but each map may take a few tries to complete.

Planning on extending it and adding a boss fight as a post-jam version!

You can edit the levels using any image editor, just make sure to use the exact color for each tile. Once i get some sleep i will publish a list of colors for each tile!

Controls:

- A/D - Move sideways

- W - Jump / Walljump

Known Issues:

- Enemies, specially the blade thrower throw you extremely far

away

- If you get killed by a spinner you sometimes spawn out of the level.

Made in C++ and Allegro, without any engine :)

Build for Linux may come soon (If i figure out how to compile my code :P)

I don't have a Mac, so no Mac build, sorry :(

Cheers!

Note: Make sure you download the latest version!
